headline: Trimble and Liebherr Introduce Trimble Ready Factory Option for Liebherr PR 776 Generation 8 Bulldozers
summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) and Liebherr announced the introduction of a Trimble Ready® factory option for the new line of Liebherr PR 776 Generation 8 bulldozers, the latest model from Liebherr's competitive dozer lineup to feature this advanced technology. This option allows bulldozers shipped direct from the Liebherr factory to be pre-equipped with a Trimble Ready kit, streamlining onsite installation of the Trimble Earthworks grade control platform. By reducing both cost and complexity, this fac

headline: Dig Smarter, Not Harder: Trimble Tech Turns Excavators into Precision Construction Tool
summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) today announced the availability of its Trimble Siteworks Machine Guidance Module for tilt bucket attachments. By integrating the full range of motion of the tilt bucket's cutting edge into the Siteworks machine guidance and layout software, field operators can now achieve precise grading and leveling, efficient ditch cleaning and shaping, accurate backfilling and complex slope work. This allows for construction of contoured landscapes and effective operation in confined

content.title: Dig Smarter, Not Harder: Trimble Tech Turns Excavators into Precision Construction Tool
content.summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) today announced the availability of its Trimble Siteworks Machine Guidance Module for tilt bucket attachments. By integrating the full range of motion of the tilt bucket's cutting edge into the Siteworks machine guidance and layout software, field operators can now achieve precise grading and leveling, efficient ditch cleaning and shaping, accurate backfilling and complex slope work. This allows for construction of contoured landscapes and effective operation in confined

thumbnail.caption: Trimble announced the Trimble Siteworks Machine Guidance module for tilt bucket attachments. Adding this technology onto excavators provides operators with in-cab visibility of the cutting edge through its full range, further extending the versatility of onsite operations.
